thread.title: Venus Williams Tops Serena by Beating Roberta Vinci in a Semi-Final
thread.title_full: Venus Williams Tops Serena by Beating Roberta Vinci in a Semi-Final

title: Venus Williams Tops Serena by Beating Roberta Vinci in a Semi-Final
text:
Get Sports Alerts 
3 Oct 2015 05:47 AM EST 
Venus Williams has done what her sister Serena could not do, beating Roberta Vinci after saving a match point in the semi-finals of the Wuhan Open. The unseeded Williams won 5-7, 6-2, 7-6 after Vinci came from 4-1 down in the final set but failed to serve out the match when leading 6-5. The No15-seeded Italian sliced a backhand into the net on her match point and Williams pounced, hitting a pair of huge groundstrokes in the next two points to break back. Williams ripped a forehand volley to go up 6-4 in the tiebreaker and clinched the victory when Vinci missed a forehand wide. Venus, who earned her 700th career victory to reach the quarter-finals, had never dropped a set against the Italian, who ended Serenaâ€™s chances of a calendar-year grand slam in the US Open semi-finals.
